title: Google\Cloud\OrgPolicy\V2\Constraint\BooleanConstraint
name: BooleanConstraint
description:
A Constraint that is either enforced or not.

For example a constraint constraints/compute.disableSerialPortAccess. If it is enforced on a VM instance, serial port connections will not be opened to that instance.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.orgpolicy.v2.Constraint.BooleanConstraint

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.
